column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Chidinma - Thank you very much for the 5-star follow-up review. Your words are supremely valuable to us because it means one thing: We are consistent with our food and service. This is every restaurateur's goal. That said
column2: regular customers such as yourself also keep our lights on and our families fed
column3: so on behalf of the 50+ employees who work at JINYA-Midtown: Thank you!
